Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes the Congregation Beis Medrash of Lawrence to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
Summary: Authorizes the Congregation Beis Medrash of Lawrence to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the Congregation Beis Medrash of Lawrence to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
